name: places/ChIJiUeKOJpZwokRHvzxGUKBuls
adrFormatAddress: 755 Broadway, New York, NY 10003, USA

editorialSummary.text: Chain retailer carrying a wide selection of trendy brand-name & designer sunglasses.

originalText.text: Irving was amazing! He went above and beyond to insure I was serviced properly and his customer service exceeded my expectation. Thank you Irving!!!! I’ll be back to purchase my next pair!

text.text: Irving was amazing! He went above and beyond to insure I was serviced properly and his customer service exceeded my expectation. Thank you Irving!!!! I’ll be back to purchase my next pair!

originalText.text:
Came in here to browse and hopefully purchase a pair of sunglasses. Right away, a snotty store clerk demanded to know my price point. Taken aback, I replied around $200. He looked disgusted and told me "Only Raybans for that price point", gesturing me to a corner where the ray bans were displayed. It was extremely rude.

I felt as though I were being belittled for not wanting to spend a small fortune on sunglasses. He was awful, looking down on me for my "meager" price point. What's really tragic was his bleached hair - really did not compliment his skin tone. I ended up finding a pair I liked but I'll buy them from a different website, I don't want to give such an unprofessional company my business.

I'm a graduate student at Columbia paying my way through school. I'm not ashamed to find a good deal. I won't be stepping foot in a sunglasses hut again. Judging by the other negative reviews, it looks like this place is a train wreck. Avoid unless you enjoy being belittled.

originalText.text: Huge shoutout to Ronny at 755 Broadway for making my experience an ideal one. Id also like to acknowledge the store manager for ensuring that i was treated like a valued guest.

text.text: Huge shoutout to Ronny at 755 Broadway for making my experience an ideal one. Id also like to acknowledge the store manager for ensuring that i was treated like a valued guest.

originalText.text:
I recently visited Sunglass Hut NoHo and was blown away by the exceptional customer service and fantastic selection of sunglasses. The staff was incredibly knowledgeable and friendly, and they went above and beyond to help me find the perfect pair of sunglasses for my face shape and style preferences.

The store had a wide range of high-quality sunglasses from top brands. The displays were well-organized, and the ample lighting made it easy to see all the different options.

The store had a comfortable and inviting atmosphere, with plenty of mirrors to try on sunglasses and get a good look at how they fit. The staff was patient and helpful as I tried on different styles and asked questions.

Overall, my experience at this Sunglass Hut store was fantastic, and I couldn't be happier with my new sunglasses. I highly recommend this store to anyone looking for a great selection of high-quality sunglasses and exceptional customer service.

originalText.text: Came here to adjust my Ray-Bans yesterday and the person who helped me was not only helpful, but great at their job. Store is well organized, and everyone was very friendly.
